Had the 24€ dinner with goat cheese salad and the tortellini, tuna for main course and lemon cake and Kir royal&truffels for dessert.- Salad and tortellini were good and fresh- The tuna dish was excellent and both dishes were of an approriate size.- Lemon cake was very nice but the truffels were a little cold.Espresso and sangria were very good. Staff a little unresponsive.
